attributes.action: Invest heavily in renewable energy and net carbon reduction from the atmosphere
attributes.additional_details:
https://royalsociety.org/topics-policy/projects/climate-change-evidence-causes/basics-of-climate-change/
http://www.pnas.org/content/97/4/1406.short - 
The economic impacts of climate change: evidence from agricultural output and random fluctuations in weather
attributes.background: 2019 is set to have record levels of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere, with a projected 411ppm. We have 12 years before the effects of climate change are irreversible. When she grows up old enough to ask "Why Daddy...?" my 7 month old baby will have to hear that we just didn't bother hard enough
